text:
Hello Everyone,
I wish to contribute to JULIA in GSoC this year and am confused on where to get started. I've heard contributing to the community on Github is a good starting point. But the codebase is pretty overwhelming and I cannot find a starting point. Can someone point to some good first issues for beginners.
Thanks in anticipation
